title: Replace website logo with custom design

requirements.summary: Replace the existing Milletmist website logo with a new custom logo design across all components
acceptanceCriteria: New logo replaces the current logo in the Navigation component
New logo replaces the current logo in the Hero section
New logo replaces the current logo in the Footer component
Logo maintains consistent sizing and positioning across all components
Logo works correctly on both light and dark backgrounds where applicable

file_operations.description: Update the logo image source to reference the generated logo asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/milletmist-logo.dim_400x400.png. Ensure the logo maintains its current sizing and positioning within the navigation bar, and verify it works correctly with the scroll detection styling changes.

Update the logo image source to reference the generated logo asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/milletmist-logo.dim_400x400.png. Ensure the logo maintains its current sizing and positioning within the hero section layout, and verify it displays correctly against the background image.

Update the logo image source to reference the generated logo asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/milletmist-logo.dim_400x400.png. Ensure the logo maintains its current sizing and positioning within the footer layout alongside the company name and copyright information.

requirements.summary: Render the generated custom logo as a static asset from frontend/public/assets/generated directory
acceptanceCriteria: Logo file is referenced from frontend/public/assets/generated path
Logo displays correctly in all locations where it appears
No routing through backend for logo asset delivery

file_operations.description: Ensure the logo src attribute uses the relative path /assets/generated/milletmist-logo.dim_400x400.png which references the static asset from the public directory without backend routing. Verify the image loads correctly and add appropriate alt text for accessibility.
